pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, February 12, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Halifax, Nova Scotia

2:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nova Scotia, Stephen McNeil.

Office of the Premier
1700 Granville Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.

4:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Halifax, Mike Savage.

Halifax City Hall
1841 Argyle Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
